title: One paper conditionally accepted to CHI 2026
summary: Our paper Understanding Agency of Home-Based Care Patients Through Information Practices and Relational Dynamics in Care Networks has been conditionally accepted to CHI 2026.

title: One paper published to Scientific Reports
summary: Our paper about Patient-Friendly Clinical Notes has been published to Scientific Reports 16.

title: Accepted into the Ph.D. program @ID KAIST
summary: I'm excited to share that I've accepted into the Ph.D. program at ID KAIST and will be continuing my studies at the DxD Lab.

title: Attended DIS 2025
summary: I presented the paper NoRe: Augmenting Journaling Experience with Generative AI for Music Creation at DIS 2025 in Madeira, Portugal.

title: One paper accepted to DIS 2025
summary: Our paper NoRe: Augmenting Journaling Experience with Generative AI for Music Creation has been accepted to DIS 2025.

title: Joined the DxD Lab @ID KAIST
summary: I joined the DxD Lab at ID KAIST as a Master's student.
